text: @realDonaldTrump Fake-Obamagate. Fake-voter fraud. Fake-Scarborough murder. True-100k dead from Covid19 because you failed to react quickly with a national response. You’re a fake President. Looking forward to all those mail-in votes that will toss you out of the White House. #JoeBiden2020
